Model.Game

Class ClientGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Game.ClientGame

  • public class ClientGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the game that runs on the client. The client's player has his/her own field and the other players are contained in a list of SocketPlayers. Created by Martijn on 30-1-2016.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Board board
      The Board associated with this game.
      private Player currentPlayer
      The player whose turn it currently is.
      private java.util.List<SocketPlayer> otherPlayers
      List of other players.
      private Player thisPlayer
      The player who plays on this client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientGame(Strategy strategy, java.lang.String thisPlayer, java.util.List<Tile> thisHand, java.lang.String[] otherPlayers)
      Constructs a new ClientGame with initial values for the fields.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientGame

        public ClientGame(Strategy strategy,
          java.lang.String thisPlayer,
          java.util.List<Tile> thisHand,
          java.lang.String[] otherPlayers)
        Constructs a new ClientGame with initial values for the fields.
        Parameters:
        strategy - The Strategy the computer player will be using, if there is one.
        thisPlayer - The name of the human player, if there is one.
        thisHand - The hand of the player that plays on this client.
        otherPlayers - The names of the other players.

    • Method Detail

      • setCurrentPlayer

        public void setCurrentPlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the current player to the player with name name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of new current player.

      • madeTradeMove

        public void madeTradeMove(java.lang.String player,
                 int[] move)
        This method is called when a TradeMove is made with the player that made the move and the move itself as an int array as parameters. It sets the corresponding SocketPlayer's currentMove to the move that was made.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that made the move.
        move - The move that was made.

      • madePutMove

        public void madePutMove(java.lang.String player,
               java.util.List<int[]> move)
        This method is called when a PutMove is made with the player that made the move and the move itself as a list of int arrays as parameters. It sets the corresponding SocketPlayer's currentMove to the move that was made. The move should be constructed as follows: move[i]: {X-coordinate, Y-coordinate, Tile's ID}
        Parameters:
        player - The player that made the move.
        move - The move that was made.
